name: Micro Tanks!
description:
Micro Tanks!

Local 2 player tank based action.  

Manage your bullets and your fuel. Fight to destroy the enemy. Prove who is the greatest tank.

HOW TO PLAY

Player 1 -

  • A/D, move left and right
  • W, hold to charge a shot
  • Q/E, aim barrel

Player 2-

  • left/right arrow keys, move left and right
  • Up arrow, hold to charge a shot
  • Shift/End, aim barrel

Press ESC to pause
